name: pn junction diode
description: semiconductor device made of two regions, one is positive and the other is negative

name: bjt
description: bipolar junction transistor is made of either two positive and one negative or two negative and one positive regions, it has an emitter, a base and a collector

name: mosfet
description: metal oxide semiconductor field effect transistor is a semiconductor device with a little more complex circuitry, it has a metal oxide layer and consist of three parts source, drain and gate
